results.title: Effects of chronic treatment with lisinopril on cardiovascular complications in streptozotocin diabetic and DOCA hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: Treatment of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (1 mg kg-1, p.o. daily for six weeks), in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ animals prevented @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@ induced @<m>DISEASE_Body_Weight</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001835 @@@loss of body weight@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Bradycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D001919 @@@bradycardia@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypothyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@.

citations.NLM: Sevak AR, Goyal RK. Effects of chronic treatment with lisinopril on cardiovascular complications in streptozotocin diabetic and DOCA hypertensive rats. Pharmacol Res. 1996 Nov-Dec;34(5-6):201-9. PMID: 9076844
